title: cc菜单打开其他的菜单
author: caozheng2015
txt_content: cc菜单打开其他的菜单怎么设置KEEP-OPEN—这个写在哪里

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
TreeDiagramF4:
  NAME: ' '
  ID: 160
  DATA-VALUE: 15
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 6

只要再position xy上方任意位置均可
我上面的例子你参照一下

解决请给最佳嗷。谢谢

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: caozheng2015
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-4 10:11
写在DATA-VALUE下面一行就可以了
DATA-VALUE我菜单上没写

replies.author: caozheng2015
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-4 10:11
写在DATA-VALUE下面一行就可以了
menu-settings:

  # REQUIRED
  # Appears as the title of the menu.
  name: '&1游戏菜单'

  # REQUIRED
  # The number of rows in the menu.
  rows: 3

  # OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')

  # OPTIONAL
  # How frequently the menu will be refreshed, in seconds.
  # Useful if you have variables in items' descriptions.
  auto-refresh: 5
  # OPTIONAL
  # This command command will be executed when the menu is opened.
  # Supports all the icon command types.
  

  # OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only when right-clicking with a compass.
  open-with-item:
    id: compass
    left-click: false
    right-click: true

######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################

1:
  ID: 395
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
  NAME: '&c*&2地图'
  LORE: 
    - '&7点击选择传送列表'
  COMMAND: 'op:chestcommands open shijie'

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
caozheng2015 发表于 2019-8-4 10:14
menu-settings:

  # REQUIRED
1:
  ID: 395
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
  NAME: '&c*&2地图'
  LORE: 
    - '&7点击选择传送列表'
  COMMAND: 'op:chestcommands open shijie'

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Zapic
replies.txt_content:
我服了你们…
一个都不知道有open: 函数么…
不需要op: cc open,不需要keep-open.
只需要这样:
COMMAND: 'open: menu.yml'复制代码
就这么简单.
